display_long_description:
Never miss out on what's going on in VR! LIV Connect is the companion app to LIV's mobile app that lets you watch yourself and friends in Virtual Reality. Use LIV Connect to connect to your iPhone or iPad and start watching today!

Requirements

● an iOS device (iPhone or iPad) with the LIV mobile app installed
● a Wi-Fi connection (ideally 5 GHz)
● 1 or more Oculus MRC supported games, listed here - https://creator.oculus.com/mrc/

How It Works

The app connects your headset to the LIV app on your mobile device. From there you can align your controllers, start a game and start watching.

LIV Connect offers:

● connecting to the LIV app on your mobile device via Wi-Fi
● in-app camera frame to align controllers for optimal VR syncing

Game on!
